item.title: Angela Lamarca, MD, PhD, MSc - The Power of Personalised Approaches in Advanced CCA: Team-Based Strategies to Individualise Clinical Care
item.description: Go online to PeerView.com/NJR860 to view the activity, download slides and practice aids, and complete the post-test to earn credit. Feed: https://c.peerview.com/podcast/xml/gastroenterology_audio.xml

item.title: Hype or Hope? The Promise of Restoration and Rewilding
item.description: What can be done with environments that have become degraded through human activity, and how can you set right what has gone wrong? That is the question that Brit Garner and Carla Brown explore in this episode of the podcast. They hear about the problems, challenges - and solutions - on land and in marine environments... Feed: https://feed.podbean.com/natureinsight/feed.xml
